page.title: 05A GLOSSOPDALE SCHOOLGIRL (1)
page.content: At{7.30am}I get up,go in the bathroom, have a wash, then get ready for{school Having got all my things ready I put them in my{school bag,}go down stairs into the kitchen, and have{breakfast which is usually 'Start' and 'Sultana Bran'. I watch Tv before setting off at{8.25am}for School. At the shops I meet two friends Rachael and Jonathan with whom I usually walk the rest of the way to be there at{8.40am.}We sit down and talk or play{games}eg.{'Kingy','Hop-scotch' and{'Catch'.} We are called inside at{8.50am.} Miss Evans takes the register and talks us through our jobs for the day (which we do in groups). On some days we go to the hall for { {assembly}or hymn practice before carrying on with our jobs until break at{10.30am.} <cont.)
